comment.author: 17052272@N08
comment._content: Was he His Royal Highness The Prince Alfred, The Duke of Edinburgh, later The Duke of Saxe-Coburg and Gotha? And this photograph was taken on 16 April 1869 in Hong Kong.

comment.author: 13496834@N08
comment._content: Very likely as compared from other pictures of the same prince on the web. He had visited to Hong Kong.
